about_the_game:
A Towerful of Block-Breaking Challenges!

Chico and his friend Beeatrice discover a mysterious tower in the forest. Inside, you'll help them navigate through an adventure's worth of block-breaking challenges! Take aim, and fire your walnut at the array of blocks. Dash and tail-whip to try and keep it up for a higher score, or dive to save it from falling into the pit as a last resort.

Between special block types, stage hazards and devices, and even boss battles, no two challenges are alike!

Power-up!

With a wide variety of creative power-ups for your walnut, you'll have to see how different abilities and block types interact to clear these challenges. Set leafy blocks ablaze with a fire powerup, or crash through bouncy cloud blocks with a spikey wrecking ball!

The Celestial Tower

All of the block-breaking action takes place inside the mysterious Celestial Tower! In between stages, you'll explore the tower as a large interconnected dungeon. Find keys, solve puzzles, and explore further and further to gain access to more Rebound challenges!

name: Chico's Rebound

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and up
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A mysterious tower full of challenges has appeared. Launch Chico's walnut up at the blocks to break them all! Dash, dive, and tail-whip, while deploying an arsenal of creative power-ups. In between stages explore the Celestial Tower to solve puzzles, earn rewards, and uncover its secrets!
